item.title: SDL Chapter 1
item.description: Intro How Chapter 1 works? Init SDL with SDL_Init(). Create window with SDL_CreateWindow(). Get surface with SDL_GetWindowSurface(). do something with surface. (like SDL_FillRect()). Update surface with SDL_UpdateWindowSurface(). you can delay loop( for window lasting) with SDL_Delay(). If you done all your jobs with SDL, Destroy window with SDL_DestroyWindow(). Don’t forget calling SDL_Quit() for terminating all jobs! SDL.h main header file for sdl.
